#summary Using M-F jumpers instead of Beadboard

= Alternative: No Breadboards =

We need jumper wires.  Try using Male to Female jumper wires to eliminate the cost of the Bread Board.

= 21 conductors =

We need 21 conductors to connect the base configuration of the LittleRobot: 

4 for Bluetooth
6 for MotorA
6 for MotorB
4 for SR04 ultrasonic range finder. 

1 additional connection is needed for the SR04.  The SR04 is a 5 volt part, and needs a 220 - 330 ohm resistor to prevent damage to the Prop 3.3 volt input pins. So we need ONE Male to Male connector to run from the SR04 ECHO pin to the 330 ohm resistor. Already present is the M-F connection , so connect this to the other lead of the 330 ohm resistor.

The LittleRobotDemoProgram has two configurations, BOT1 and BOT2.

If you connect the wires as shown, the software will detect the configuration.
